title: Educational Technology-Based Emotional Design Strategy Workshop: Customized Approach for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational understanding of educational technology and basic experience in professional fields
context.additional_context: Strategy development to address emotional barriers experienced by professionals in medical/legal/technical fields during language education

learning_goals: Learners can utilize three or more tools to analyze elements that induce fear, anger, and envy when designing educational content.
Learners can create two or more interactive learning modules that evoke empathy and enjoyment.
Learners can complete a project portfolio evaluating emotion-based learning experiences in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
